docs.snippet: Argentina wants HSBC Holdings Plc to repatriate $3.5 billion that it says the bank's Argentine branch moved offshore to help clients evade taxes and move capital abroad, the country's tax chief said on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina wants HSBC Holdings Plc to repatriate $3.5 billion that it says the bank's Argentine branch moved offshore to help clients evade taxes and move capital abroad, the country's tax chief said on Monday.

headline.main: Argentina Wants HSBC to Repatriate $3.5 Billion in Offshore Funds
headline.print_headline: Argentina Wants HSBC to Repatriate $3.5 Billion in Offshore Funds

docs.snippet: Rapid growth in Latin America over the past decade still left one in five residents of the region living on less than $4 a day, the World Bank said in a report on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Rapid growth in Latin America over the past decade still left one in five residents of the region living on less than $4 a day, the World Bank said in a report on Monday.

headline.main: Latin America's Poorest Need New Programs: World Bank
headline.print_headline: Latin America's Poorest Need New Programs: World Bank

docs.snippet: Diego Forlan, whose fine performances and five goals helped Uruguay finish fourth in the 2010 World Cup, announced his retirement from international football on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Diego Forlan, whose fine performances and five goals helped Uruguay finish fourth in the 2010 World Cup, announced his retirement from international football on Thursday.

headline.main: Forlan, Symbol of Uruguay Renaissance, Quits National Team
headline.print_headline: Forlan, Symbol of Uruguay Renaissance, Quits National Team

docs.snippet: Italy have moved back into the top 10 of FIFA's world rankings for the first time since last June despite not playing a match since November.
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy have moved back into the top 10 of FIFA's world rankings for the first time since last June despite not playing a match since November.

headline.main: Italy Back Into FIFA Top 10 Without Playing a Match
headline.print_headline: Italy Back Into FIFA Top 10 Without Playing a Match

docs.snippet: A discrepancy between European and American copyright protection affects plans to publish Mondrian’s work and has wider ramifications for art scholars.
docs.lead_paragraph: A discrepancy between European and American copyright protection affects plans to publish Mondrian’s work and has wider ramifications for art scholars.

headline.main: As Artworks Enter Public Domain, Rules Remain Confusing
headline.print_headline: Some, but Not All, of Mondrian's Works Fall Into Public Domain
